column5: He's putting on a great show.
it was a great finish to the game allround!
Good old Etobicoke boy!! Good work Joey!!
Joey had a great year last year with the reds, he`ll be a star for sure. Kills my cubs every time they play

I've seen him a few times at AA Chattanooga, in spring training with the big club and several times in Cincy last year.  He's a combination of great talent and class.   Nobody outworks him.  Will be in Sarasota for a few games beginning March 20.
Team Canada played their butts off today, they should be proud of almost beating the Americans, and yeah, great game by Votto.
